Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/objectyaml/goffemitter-cpp/#l00128">128</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/objectyaml/goffemitter-cpp">GOFFEmitter.cpp</a>.

### write&#95;impl() {#a8d4320d5e4f000b91aa598d727b28fe5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;GOFFEmitter.cpp&#125;::GOFFOstream::write&#95;impl (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; Ptr, size&#95;t Size)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
The is the piece of the class that is implemented by subclasses.

This writes the <code>Size</code> bytes starting at <code>Ptr</code> to the underlying stream.

This function is guaranteed to only be called at a point at which it is safe for the subclass to install a new buffer via SetBuffer.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Ptr">The start of the data to be written. For buffered streams this is guaranteed to be the start of the buffer.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Size">The number of bytes to be written.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Invariant">
&#123; Size &gt; 0 &#125;
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/objectyaml/goffemitter-cpp/#l00143">143</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/objectyaml/goffemitter-cpp">GOFFEmitter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
